alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Limestone; Madison (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 11:18AM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...Strong winds will impact portions of northern Jackson, northern Madison, northern Limestone, Moore, Lincoln and Franklin Counties through 1145 AM CDT... At 1116 AM CDT, emergency managers in Southern Middle Tennessee reported strong outflow winds along a line from near Shelbyville to 10 miles north of Pulaski. These winds are ahead of any thunderstorms moving into the area from Tennessee. Movement of the outflow winds is southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Northern Huntsville, Athens, Winchester, Fayetteville, Bridgeport, Moores Mill, Meridianville, Lynchburg, Hazel Green and Decherd. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for Middle Tennessee.
